title: Intern - Marketing
jd: Be an undergraduate/fresh graduate or be following/completed an equivalent professional qualification available to work full-time.
Having prior working experience up to 6 months will be an added advantage.
Be passionate about working with big brands.
Be able to support with planning & delivery of brand-related activities.

title: Brands Project - Assistant
jd: Be a fresh graduate or have completed an equivalent professional qualification available to work full-time.
Prior experience working on brands in the FMCG industry will be an advantage.
Be passionate about working with big brands.
Be able to support with planning & delivery of brand-related activities.
